WeOnBikes - Radwandern, Bikepacking-Erfa: WeOnBikes - bicycle touring, bikepacking and cycling life in Europe
Radwandern ist unsere Leidenschaft. Prak: Bicycle touring is our passion; practical tips, cycling routes, packing lists - we share our experiences on bikepacking, bike trips and cycling life with you in our blog and book.
Uta und Menno fahren im Sonnenschein auf: Uta and Menno ride their bikes in the sunshine along a rocky path on the coast of the Barents Sea. In the background the North Cape.
Radfernwege Nord-Süd durch Europa: Long-Distance Cycling Routes North to South through Europe
Die 7 beliebtesten Fahrradrouten von Nor: 7 popular bike touring routes from north to south through Europe. Would you like to cycle from cape to cape, see the capitals, mountains, the countryside, tour from the Baltic Sea to the Mediterranean, go on a pilgrimage on St. Jame's Way, to Trondheim or Rome? Here you'll find routes and useful tips.
Mir ist es eingefallen, während ich Fahr:
It is by riding a bicycle that you learn the contours of a country best, since you have to sweat up the hills and coast down them.
(Ernest Hemingway)
Fahrradfahren macht glücklich, schont im: Cycling makes you happy. It’s easy on your nerves in city traffic and provides the exercise you need in everyday life.  On long-distance journeys, the bike also carries you through the country at the ideal travel speed: fast enough to circumnavigate the world and yet with enough leisure for an encounter and a conversation.
Deshalb haben wir uns mit <strong>Fahrra: Thus we set off on bikes with our tent from Moscow to the North Cape: a 4000 km cycling holiday through Russia, Karelia, Finland and Lapland to Norway, a trip you can go on in our book.
<strong>2023 geht die Reise weiter</stro: In 2023 the trip will continue: this time from north to south, from the North Cape to Cape St. Vincent.
Bis dahin erwartet uns eine aufregende R: Until then, we have exciting travel plans we’d like to share with you.
Deshalb haben wir WeOnBikes in Leben ger: That's why we created WeOnBikes. On our website we offer useful information about cycling life and cycling tours. Get inspired and join in!
Wer hier reist und schreibt: Who is travelling and writing here
Wir, das sind Uta aus Deutschland und Me: We are Uta from Germany and Menno from the Netherlands.
Wir wohnen in Portugal, ganz in der Nähe: We live in Portugal, close to Lisbon, and we cycle at every opportunity. We don’t even have a car.
Als technische Übersetzerin und als Soft: We work freelance from home as technical translator (Uta) and software developer (Menno).
Alle paar Jahre steht uns der Sinn nach: Every few years we feel like going on a long trip, a real adventure:  Get out of the rut and get on the bike.
WeOnBikes.com – Life by bicycle – ist un: WeOnBikes.com - Life by bicycle - is our new project with which we are preparing our next bicycle tour from north to south through Europe. We would like to share our experiences with everyone who is interested in bikepacking and wants to know how to go about such a trip.
Uta und Menno fahren im Sonnenschein auf: Uta and Menno ride their bikes in the sunshine along a rocky path on the coast of the Barents Sea.
Bikepacking vom Nordkap zum Cabo de São: Bikepacking from the North Cape to Cape St. Vincent in Portugal
Einmal auf dem Fahrrad von Norden nach S: By bike from north to south through the whole of Europe - from the northernmost point on mainland Europe, where the last journey ended, to the most south-western point of the continent: Cape St. Vincent in Portugal. And a few kilometers back north, to our home. That’s what we’ve planned for 2023.
Und wenn man sich die beiden Routen so a: And if you look at the two routes, it's actually clear that the project isn’t finished
Von Moskau zum Nordkap auf dem Fahrrad: From Moscow to the North Cape by bike
Mit Fahrrad und Zelt sind wir fernab vom: Far from tourist centers, we cycled from Russia to Karelia, through Finland and across the Arctic Circle with bikes and a tent. 3 countries separated us in Moscow from the northernmost point of the European continent. For 60 days we experienced adventures instead of everyday life and pedaled our bikes instead of the hamster wheel. The journey took us along 4000 kilometers of fresh air, full of interesting encounters and longing for the Barents Sea.
Hier findet ihr die Fahrradroute und kön: Here you can see the bike route as well as the photos.
Wenn dir unser Projekt gefällt, abonnier: If you like our project, subscribe to our newsletter to keep up to date.
Du kannst uns mit Vorschlägen zur Route,: You can support us on Facebook, Instagram and Youtube with suggestions for the route, bike models, equipment and whatever else you find important.  We also have interesting suggestions in our hands-on program.  If you have another idea - bring it on!
Den bebilderten Reisebericht Von Moskau: You can get the illustrated travel report From Moscow to the North Cape everywhere in stores and in all common online shops.  However, it  is best for us if you order the book via the link below.
